ygData.subject: How addicted??
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all-- i just created my 4th char. Actually, since I started playing last December, I ve also had 3 others that I ve since deleted. The new one is an Iksar
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all-- i just created my 4th char. Actually,
since I started playing last December, I've also had 3
others that I've since deleted. The new one is an Iksar
Necro, now that I have the Kunark upgrade. I've not been
to Kunark yet, and the graphics (at least in Cabalis
and LOIO) are great!!<br><br>So--- how addicted are
you? <br>How many chars on how many servers? <br>How
long have you been playing?<br>What's the longest time
you've played continuously?<br>Have you ever ditched
work/school to play?<br>Have you ever made an excuse to
family/friends/spouse/girl/boyfriend to get out of doing something with them, only to
play?<br><br>I'm not too bad right now -- though I do play most
nights and at least one day on the weekend. Some nights
only an hour, some (like last night in a great group
in Unrest) will last for 5 hours. The worst i've
done is to go home from work during lunch to check to
see if Dylln Starshine was in HighPass Hold -- hehe,
he wasn't or I may not have made it back to
work!!!<br><br>Let me know, I'm curious -- you can start replies
with "HI!! I'm __(Xela Orcbane, or examble)__, and I'm
and EQ-addict"<br><br>:laughes
hysterically<br><br>p.s.-- got a new yahoo profile just for EQ-- sound
addicted??
